ygData.subject: Re: Last names?
ygData.msgSnippet: You get a last name at 20th level (or the option to) im not sure whats involved with getting it.  I m slowly inching my way there My problem is i didn t
ygData.messageBody:
You get a last name at 20th level (or the option to) im not sure whats
involved with getting it. I'm slowly inching my way there

My problem is i didn't realize i could get a last name at 20 so i picked a
name that doesn't go well with a last name...

Shads Snorflebane?
Shads Blacknoir

I mean shads just doesn't sound good with much. =/

Shads of Freeport

On Wed, 21 Apr 1999, Ward Richardson wrote:
> Just wondering what you meant by "Almost Last-Named".
> When do you reach a point where you earn such a thing?
